content: this sweet simple top is made top down seamlessly with a round yoke and simple bobble detail included are sizes for 2-10 year olds approx designed to be slightly cropped with a small amount of positive ease you could size up if your intended recipient prefers a loose style and the pattern includes notes on where to add row if you prefer more length suitable for a confident beginner willing to take the time to track stitch counts to keep the detail row working out this garment is worked top down joining on each row so you need to watch you don t accidentally add or loose stitches at the join stitches used us terms foundation single_crochet fsc half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 5 double_crochet in one stitch bobble hcd around post from back bphdc hcd around post from front fphdc 2 half_double_crochet into one stitch increase 2hdc slip_stitch slip_stitch materials required 8ply/dk/#3 yarn 4 5mm hook 4mm hook optional darning needle measuring tape this pattern has been tested but there could still be errors - please get in touch if you find anything that might need fixing or if you have any questions
